description:
AJDA-01 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Chiffon Trouser: Lawn silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Purple

Immerse yourself in a radiant rhapsody of love with this deep purple ensemble from the "Gur Naal Ishq Mitha" collection. The silver zari and sequins weave a tale of elegance and grace, illuminating the fabric with a celestial glow. The contrasting ruby dupatta drapes like a love story unfolding, adding depth and richness. With intricately embroidered sleeves, daman, and chaak border, this ensemble is a symphony of design that celebrates the radiant beauty of love.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered center panel on chiffon
Embroidered side panels right & left panels on chiffon
30'' embroidered border for front daman on chiffon
30'' embroidered back with border on chiffon
1 meter embroidered sleeves with border on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered chaak border on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta on chiffon
1.5 meter dyed wide width lawn silk for trouser
